abstract: Stocks drift in listless trading, floating just below record highs.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Markets Edge Back From Last Week’s Highs
headline.main: U.S. Markets Edge Back From Last Week’s Highs

snippet: Wall Street closed lower Monday, weighed down by drug companies and consumer-focused stocks....
lead_paragraph: Wall Street closed lower Monday, weighed down by drug companies and consumer-focused stocks.
